org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.cards.consultation.services

Class CardSubscriptionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.cards.consultation.services.CardSubscriptionService

  • @Service
public class CardSubscriptionService
extends java.lang.Object

    Centralize request for generating CardSubscription and deleting them.

    Uses a ThreadPoolTaskScheduler delay definitive deletion of subscription (defaults to 10s)

        @Autowired
public CardSubscriptionService(org.springframework.scheduling.concurrent.ThreadPoolTaskScheduler taskScheduler,

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        public CardSubscription subscribe(org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.users.model.User user,
                                  java.lang.String clientId,
                                  java.time.Instant rangeStart,
                                  java.time.Instant rangeEnd,
                                  boolean filterNotification)

        Generates a CardSubscription or retrieve it from a local CardSubscription cache.

        If it finds a CardSubscription from cache, it will try to cancel possible scheduled evict

        Parameters:
        user - connected user
        clientId - client unique id (generated by ui)
        rangeStart - notification filtering start
        rangeEnd - notification filtering end
        filterNotification - filter notification on range start and end (Not implemented)
        Returns:
        the CardSubscription object which controls publisher instantiation

      • scheduleEviction

        public void scheduleEviction(java.lang.String subId)
        Schedule deletion of subscription in deletionDelay millis
        Parameters:
        subId - Subscription computed id

      • cancelEviction

        public boolean cancelEviction(java.lang.String subId)
        Cancel scheduled evict if any
        Parameters:
        subId - subscription autogenerated id
        Returns:
        true if eviction was successfuly cancelled, false may indicate that either no cancellation was possible or no eviction was previously scheduled

      • evict

        public void evict(java.lang.String subId)
        Evict subscription definitively
        Parameters:
        subId - subscription unique id subscription autogenerated id

      • findSubscription

        public CardSubscription findSubscription(org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.users.model.User user,
                                         java.lang.String uiId)

        Find existing subscription

        NB: May throw IllegalStateException if any of the parameters is missing

        Parameters:
        user - Users whom subsciption we search
        uiId - Unique client id whom subsciption we search
        Returns:
